item.title: Making a Machine Learning Model for Tennis Betting Part 2: The Betting (Work in Progress)
item.description: Deploying the model built in Part 1 to a betting scheme to see what kind of money can (hypothetically) be made.

item.title: Making a Machine Learning Model for Tennis Betting Part 1: The Model
item.description: Creating a machine learning model that predicts tennis matches efficiently enough to bet on them profitably.
